Special Qualities: Damage reduction 10/cold iron, darkvision 60 ft., immunity to electricity, resistance to acid 10 and fire 10, undead traits, vulnerability to sunlight
Abilities: Str 13, Dex 15, Con —, Int 6, Wis 12, Cha 12
Feats: Alertness, Dodge, Improved Initiative, Weapon Focus (slam)

Descripci\u00f3n: Bodaks are the undead remnants of humanoids who have been destroyed by the touch of absolute evil.A bodak retains fleeting memories of its past life and can speak Common (or some other humanoid language).

Combate: Death Gaze (Su): Death, range 30 feet, Fortitude DC 15 negates. Humanoids who die from this attack are transformed into bodaks 24 hours later. The save DC is Charisma-based.Vulnerability to Sunlight (Ex): Bodaks loathe sunlight, for its merest touch burns their impure flesh. Each round of exposure to the direct rays of the sun deals 1 point of damage to the creature.
